com.twitter.heron.instance

Class HeronInstance.DefaultExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.instance.HeronInstance.DefaultExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    Enclosing class:
    HeronInstance

    public class HeronInstance.DefaultExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    Handler for catching exceptions thrown by any threads (owned either by topology or heron infrastructure). 1. Will flush all attached log handler and close them. 2. Attempt to flush all the connection. 3. Terminate the JVM. 4. The process would be forced exiting if exceeding timeout
